name: Space Ghost Pirate Zombie Slayer
description: Is there intelligent life in the universe? Of course not, it's filled with Zombies! Sensing the opportunity for plunder, the Ghost Pirates have taken to the stars on their ethereal ships. Now it is up to YOU to take command of the Space Ghost Pirate Zombie Slayer fleet and lead them against the Zombie menace!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Or Later Processor: Intel 2 GHz Memory: 256 MB RAM Storage: 20 MB available space
